entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
